name: Mail-Bot
description:
Mail-Bot is a 3D physics simulator that focuses on a gravity-defying rope as its central mechanic. Use the Gravity Rope to launch physics objects with mind-boggling gravity as you navigate through the city to your next big delivery!

This game was made as part of the 2021 GMTK Game Jam. With the Jam's theme of "Joined Together" I aimed to reflect this in several aspects of the game. The primary gameplay involves the player character being joined with their payload by a rope, the story sees our character uniting a package with its recipient, and the world design is composed of several floating islands joined together by large bridges. 

This game was made entirely by one person! My name is Jackson and this is my first time ever developing a game and my first time partaking in a game jam. Thank you so much to everyone with GMTK responsible for putting on the event, and thank you to everyone who plays Mail-Bot!
